itemInfo.itemDesc:
A steamed bird seasoned with a quality wine. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +3% for 75 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Chicken Meat
item.desc:
An ingredient used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.

item.name: Vinegar
item.desc:
A sour liquid made of fermented grains and fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit and Vegetable Salad, Pickled Vegetables, etc.

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: Essence of Liquor
item.desc:
It can be extracted from fermented grains or fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit Wine, Exotic Herbal Wine, etc.

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Sun-Dried Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
